title: Thomas Edison on the 'Doctor of the Future'
subtitle: Rumor: Inventor Thomas Edison said that 'the doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet and in the cause and prevention of diseas
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Thomas Edison said that “The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet and in the cause and prevention of disease.”
